Vickie Dorsett: The Portfolio

A curated selection of projects demonstrating a passion for clean aesthetics and user-centric design.

Project GreenCity

An initiative to bring sustainable green spaces to urban environments. This project involved landscape architecture, community engagement, and modern design principles.

The Minimalist Workspace

Redefining the modern office with a focus on minimalism, functionality, and employee well-being. The design promotes focus and collaboration through intelligent space utilization.
css: .alt-cols-gallery-section { font-family: -apple-system, BlinkMacSystemFont, 'Segoe UI', Roboto, Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; background-color: #FFFFFF; padding: 4rem 2rem; } .alt-cols-gallery-header { text-align: center; max-width: 800px; margin: 0 auto 4rem auto; } .alt-cols-gallery-header h1 { font-size: 2.8rem; margin-bottom: 1rem; color: #212529; } .alt-cols-gallery-header p { font-size: 1.2rem; color: #6C757D; line-height: 1.6; } .alt-cols-gallery-row { display: flex; align-items: center; max-width: 1200px; margin: 0 auto 4rem auto; gap: 2rem; } .alt-cols-gallery-row.reverse { flex-direction: row-reverse; } .alt-cols-gallery-img-col, .alt-cols-gallery-text-col { width: 50%; } .alt-cols-gallery-img-col img { width: 100%; border-radius: 8px; display: block; box-shadow: 0 4px 15px rgba(0,0,0,0.1); } .alt-cols-gallery-text-col h3 { font-size: 1.8rem; margin-bottom: 1rem; color: #343A40; } .alt-cols-gallery-text-col p { font-size: 1rem; color: #495057; line-height: 1.7; } @media (max-width: 768px) { .alt-cols-gallery-row, .alt-cols-gallery-row.reverse { flex-direction: column; } .alt-cols-gallery-img-col, .alt-cols-gallery-text-col { width: 100%; } .alt-cols-gallery-text-col { text-align: center; padding-top: 1rem; } .alt-cols-gallery-header h1 { font-size: 2.2rem; } }
js: window.addEventListener('load', () => { document.querySelectorAll('img[src^="https://pixabay.com/api/"]').forEach(img => { fetch(img.src).then(response => response.json()).then(data => { if (data.hits && data.hits.length > 0) { img.src = data.hits[0].largeImageURL; } else { img.src = 'https://via.placeholder.com/1280x720?text=Image+Not+Found'; } }).catch(error => { console.error('Error fetching Pixabay image:', error); img.src = 'https://via.placeholder.com/1280x720?text=Image+Not+Found'; }); }); });
